text: @realDonaldTrump Do you even read your own tweets? If the Germans were dropping bombs on polling places, we would’ve done mail-in. The #coronavirus is in wave 1 and raging in many states. Lining up at polling places is too high risk for many- Ds and Rs. Mail-in is the safest option.
